sentences.en: As the fruity orgy wound down and the hoses came out to wash down the streets.

sentences.en: Christmas, for many people, involves an orgy of spending, which is good for the economy.
sentences.cn: 对许多人来说, 圣诞节就意味着纵情狂欢地去购物, 这对于经济大有好处.

sentences.en: Emperor Nero attended the bacchanalian orgy.
sentences.cn: 尼禄皇(罗马暴君)参加了狂饮的祭酒神仪式.

sentences.en: Environmentalists looking on this orgy of consumption can only be appalled.
sentences.cn: 而环保主义者看到这样无度的消费也只能是感到惊骇了.

sentences.en: Extraordinary optimism sustained an orgy of speculation.
sentences.cn: 极端乐观主义纵容了疯狂的投机事业.

sentences.en: He blew £533,000 in an 18-month orgy of spending.
sentences.cn: 他在18个月的奢靡生活中挥霍了533,000英镑。

sentences.en: I indulged in an orgy of housework.
sentences.cn: 我整天埋在干不完的家务活儿里.

sentences.en: Instead, recruitment is often an orgy of hyperbole.
sentences.cn: 而事实上, 招聘常常是没边儿的夸张.

sentences.en: It is she who has come to the infernal orgy.
sentences.cn: 就是她来参加这阴间的狂欢了.

sentences.en: She indulged in an orgy of spending.
sentences.cn: 她爱好大把大把地花钱.

sentences.en: The City is currently engaged in an orgy of memory loss.
sentences.cn: 时下,伦敦金融城正经历一场疯狂的“记忆失落”.

sentences.en: Their libraries an orgy of overloading, giving the same name to dozens of different operations.
sentences.cn: 它们的库文件也都在滥用重载, 给数十计的不同操作取上相同的名称.

sentences.en: They embarked on an orgy of sightseeing.
sentences.cn: 他们开始尽情地观光游览.

sentences.en: This orgy of spending and enormous deficits you voted for almost all of his budgets.
sentences.cn: 而八年后,你站在这里,说你要主导花销的控制.
